mapper.select:
select e.* from bank_rights_packagerk_mapping e where rights_packagerk_id is not null
and RIGHTS_PACKAGERK_CODE like "%"#{rightsPackagerkCode}"%"
and RIGHTS_PACKAGERK_NAME like "%"#{rightsPackagerkName}"%"
mapper.insert: insert into bank_rights_packagerk_mapping ( rights_packagerk_name, rights_packagerk_code, app_show_name) values ( #{rightsPackagerkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rightsPackagerkCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appShowName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select count(1) from bank_rights_packagerk_mapping t where t.rights_packagerk_code=#{rightsPackagerkCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t.rights_packagerk_id as rightsPackagerkId, t.rights_packagerk_name as rightsPackagerkName, t.rights_packagerk_code as rightsPackagerkCode, t.app_show_name as appShowName from bank_rights_packagerk_mapping t where t.rights_packagerk_id=#{rightsPackagerkId}
